message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you consider meeting me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $97. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $94?
